1 teaspoon kosher salt,1/2 teaspoon pepper,1 teaspoon garlic powder,3 skinless, boneless chicken breasts,1 tablespoon olive oil,1/2 cup onion,3 cloves garlic,1 tablespoon chili powder,2 teaspoons ground cumin,2 cups plus 3 tablespoons water,1 chicken bouillon cube,1 (7 ounce) can green chiles,3 tablespoons all-purpose flour,2 cups peanut oil or vegetable oil for frying, or as needed,8 (10 to 12-inch) flour tortillas,1 1/2 cups refried beans,1 (8 ounce) block pepper Jack cheese,shredded lettuce,,
